Commentary: Mohammad Irfan to Bismillah Khan, no run, right on target around the off stump from length, Bismillah starts by defending it back
Mohammad Irfan to Bismillah Khan, no run, short of good length now and angling outside off, pushed to point

Mohammad Irfan to Bismillah Khan, OUT, Irfan has struck, Bismillah was squared up completely and the finger has gone up but the batsman looks unhappy! Much shorter ball on leg stump and massive swing and bounce, Bismillah closed the face of the bat towards the leg side and it looked like the ball deviated so much that the keeper had to dive in front of first slip to take the catch. Haddin it was
Wicket: ['Bismillah Khan c †Haddin b Mohammad Irfan 0 (3b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, no run, beats KP first ball! Just short of length and swinging away, KP pokes and misses
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, no run, around short of length and he steers it to midwicket
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, 1 run, fuller and wider and there's enough room for KP to drive it a bit wide of mid-off to get off the mark
Imran Khalid to Pietersen, no run, charges down first ball to slog to the leg side but takes it on the pad outside leg
Imran Khalid to Pietersen, 1 run, just outside off now on length, KP drives it down to long-off
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, on length on off, pushed back to the bowler
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, shuffles down and flicks the ball past midwicket to get off the mark
Imran Khalid to Pietersen, 1 run, walks down towards the off side and chips the ball in the air just wide of the bowler's right to long-on
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, goes back and opens up to work the ball towards deep square leg for one
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, flicks the ball from middle and leg to midwicket for a single
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, SIX, hammered! It was short, KP unleashed a massive backlift and swung the bat so hard the ball had to go beyond the midwicket boundary, the crowd erupts!
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, no run, full and wide outside off, KP drives firmly but straight to cover
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, no run, back of length now and the ball just about holds its line well outside off, KP swings for a square drive and misses

Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, no run, shuffles across to off and drills the ball back. That's not it, Irfan grabs it with both hands and shatters the stumps as KP was outside the crease while playing the shot, but back in time
Mohammad Irfan to Pietersen, 2 runs, slightly slower at 120kph, it' short again and KP pulls but not from the middle. He gets enough to collect two over the midwicket fielder
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, pretty flat on off stump, no turn, he defends it back
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, dances down to take the ball on the full and drills it back all along the ground to beat mid-off for four. There was some power packed in that shot!

Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, opens his stance on the back foot and whips it against the turn, if there was any, to deep midwicket for two. Bit of fumble from Russell in the end, but doesn't cost them much
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, charges down again, Badree pitches it shorter and Shehzad slams it square where Sharjeel dives to his right and keeps it to one
Badree to Pietersen, 1 run, comes down the track and flicks it with some power to deep midwicket
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, he's not going to Badree settle down - charges down and dispatches that straight down the ground, this time with the aerial route, and it's four more!
Mohammad Sami to Pietersen, no run, short ball with some width, KP stands tall and slams that to cover
Mohammad Sami to Pietersen, 1 run, towards the pads now and KP flicks it to midwicket for one
Mohammad Sami to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, full on middle and leg, flicked behind square easily
Mohammad Sami to Pietersen, 2 runs, another full delivery on the pads and KP flicks it wide of deep square leg for two more
Mohammad Sami to Pietersen, 2 runs, not as full this time but doesn't matter to KP, he lofts it with a pull over mid-on for two as Dre Russ gets to it in no time
Mohammad Sami to Pietersen, 1 run, drives on the off side, not middled again, but it's gone to sweeper cover for one

Russell to Pietersen, OUT, and he strikes first ball, the credit should go to the fielder though - Asif Ali! KP looked to heave the ball hard towards the cow corner but he didn't middle it and Asif ran to his right from deep square leg to just about get his fingers under the dipping ball. Great catch!
Russell to Sangakkara, 1 run, pushes the ball into the off side with soft hands and gets off the mark
Wicket: ['KP Pietersen c Asif Ali b Russell 18 (18b 0x4 1x6) SR: 100.00']

Commentary: Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, on length around off and Shehzad defends it back
Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, gets a bit of bottom edge while cutting the short ball towards point and runs across for a quick one
Russell to Sangakkara, no run, slightly full and wide, steered to point off the back foot
Russell to Sangakkara, 1 run, on the leg side now with a short ball and Sanga pivots around to pull it to leg
Badree to Sangakkara, 1 run, outside off, he guides it late to short third man for one
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, goes back in the crease and works the ball just behind square on leg
Badree to Sangakkara, 1 run, pretty full outside off, digs it down to long-off for one
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, pushes this one gently into the covers for a quick single

Badree to Sangakkara, FOUR, through the fielder and it's four! Was a bit short, a bit wide and Sanga cut it late towards short third man where the fielder dived to his left but couldn't get a hand to it
Badree to Sangakkara, no run, blocks the final ball back to the bowler

Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, direct hit and that's gone upstairs! Shehzad cuts the shortish ball to point and takes off, SAnga responds well and does even better to drag his bat in just in time. Wasn't at full stretch, though
Russell to Sangakkara, no run, middle and leg line and it's flicked to midwicket
Russell to Sangakkara, no run, tries the yorker and Sanga has to get his foot out of the way to push it to midwicket
Russell to Sangakkara, 1 leg bye, on the helmet! Sanga took his eyes off the short ball pretty early, a rare sight, and barely pulled. The ball deflected off the helmet to third man
Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, drives it hard but mistimes it a bit towards mid-off for one
Russell to Sangakkara, FOUR, there's room and Sanga stays in the crease to wait for the ball and drives it late and beautifully past point for an exquisite four!
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, lucky four! It was pretty flat on off with a bit of turn and Shehzad poked to get an outside edge and that went pretty fine on off
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, slightly slower on the off stump, blocked back now
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, shorter and flatter again, he cuts and gets an upper edge to short third man for one
Badree to Sangakkara, no run, hardly any room on off, Sanga finds cover
Badree to Sangakkara, no run, towards leg now, Sanga works it to midwicket
Badree to Sangakkara, 2 runs, some flight just outside off, Sanga drives it square off the back foot and there's a fumble in the deep, allowing them to come back for the second
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, angles it in towards middle, Shehzad defends on off
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, charges down now to slam it back but mistimes it back to the bowler
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, comes down again and works the ball towards long-on for one
Imran Khalid to Sangakkara, 1 run, shuffles a bit towards off and works it with the spin behind square on leg
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, errs down the leg side with a flat delivery, Shehzad sweeps and gets some bat or glove to get four
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, pulls the short ball towards deep square leg and he's bisected the field between deep midwicket and deep backward square for four more
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, 1 run, back of a length and outside off, Sanga leans back and cuts it to point for one
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, soft short ball outside off, Shehzad skips back and pulls firmly to the midwicket boundary. Sanga is loving this at the other end
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, Shehzad feigns to step out, Irfan spears it full around off, dabbed quietly in front of cover

Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, After conceding two fours in his last over, Khalid drops a skier. Shehzad skips out, the bowler is wary of it as he bangs it short. This tests Shehzad. He only carves it high in the air. Does not get the desired distance. Khalid runs across to his left from cover, takes his eyes off the ball, and reprieves Shehzad
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, no run, back of a length on off, too close to cut. Chopped behind to the keeper
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, FOUR, Irfan appeals for leg-before. Given as four. This one is brought back into Sanga on a shortish length. He french-cuts it away past the leg stump, fine for four
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, flat and drifts in, a helmetless Shehzad hangs back and turns through midwicket
Imran Khalid to Sangakkara, FOUR, length on middle as Sanga nips down the track and lofts it majestically over midwicket
Imran Khalid to Sangakkara, 1 run, flighted on off, smartly chipped in front of Russell at long-off
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, patted behind point for one

Imran Khalid to Sangakkara, FOUR, violent hit from Sanga; rasping straight drive. Umpire Dar swerves and ducks out of the way. Sanga races down the track and drills it straight down the ground, having the umpire in the firing line
Imran Khalid to Sangakkara, 1 run, tossed up, fullish in length, Sanga steps away and lofts it inside out, lands in front of long-off
Mohammad Sami to Sangakkara, SIX, no violence, here. Length and outside off, Sanga goes low, drops to one knee, and caresses it over the covers. Classic Sanga, it goes all the way!
Mohammad Sami to Sangakkara, 1 run, this is diverted off the thigh behind square as Sami tucks Sanga up for room
Mohammad Sami to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, fractionally short on off, Shehzad uses his wrists and plays it back to the bowler
Mohammad Sami to Sangakkara, 1 run, Sanga looks to make room outside leg, Sami chases him with a shortish ball. Tapped in front of point
Mohammad Sami to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, banged in short and outside off, front-foot pull to deep midwicket. Confident hit
Mohammad Sami to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, Shehzad shuffles across off, attempts a leg-side flick and nearly spoons a return catch off a leading edge. This Sami offering stopped a touch on the opener
Smith to Sangakkara, FOUR, loose short ball down the leg side, Sanga just helps it away behind square. Easy peasy
Smith to Sangakkara, 1 run, easily done again. Leg-stump short ball, pulled to deep midwicket
Smith to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, very, very wristy! Full and outside off, the opener shuffles across off and whips it over midwicket
Smith to Sangakkara, FOUR, Sanga dances out and gets a short ball. He does not hold anything back. Thumped over the covers
Smith to Sangakkara, no run, swish and a miss outside off
Smith to Sangakkara, SIX, Sanga raises his fifty with a six. Down the track, he gets another short ball. This is dispatched over long-off with utmost authority. The Sanga show is on in Dubai
Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, short and just a shade outside off, Shehzad keeps back and glides a single to third man
Russell to Sangakkara, 2 runs, full and straight, clipped to mid-on. Some sloppy fielding gives Quetta two

Russell to Sangakkara, OUT, Khalid makes no mistake, he takes it at long-on now. Sanga steps out and backs away for a lofted hit. He can only drag this short ball from outside off to long-on. This may have stopped on the batsman as well

Russell to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, short and attacks the ribs, Nawaz looks to fend to leg. He pops a leading edge in front of point. The batsman was ball watching, Shehzad had set off for a single. They complete it. Russell did well to quickly turn back and gather the ball, but could not throw the stumps down

Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, Shehzad raises his bat, he reaches a fifty of his own. Viv Richards applauds from the dug out. Short, possibly slow and outside off, picked up and pulled over square leg
Wicket: ['KC Sangakkara c Imran Khalid b Russell 55 (32b 7x4 2x6) SR: 171.87']

Commentary: Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, Shehzad shuffles across, this is a full toss on middle, flicked away behind square, beating fine leg's desperate dive
Badree to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, Badree lands this on off and gets it to turn past the outside edge
Badree to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, slides straight and goes on top of off, too close to cut. He misses
Badree to Mohammad Nawaz, SIX, Nawaz now charges down the track and swings it over the long-on fielding for a six

Badree to Mohammad Nawaz, OUT, take that for a riposte. This was a poor shot, though. This was neither too short nor too wide to cut. Skids off the surface on middle, Nawaz skips back for a cut, does not lay bat on ball. He hears the death rattle
Badree to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, Sarfraz secures a single to short third man and gets off the mark
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, darted short and wide outside off, square cut away for four. Shehzad rolled his wrists to keep it down
Mohammad Sami to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, short and outside off, helped down to third man
Mohammad Sami to Ahmed Shehzad, SIX, full and drifting into the pads, Shehzad picks it up over backward square leg with a whirl of the wrists. "Shehzad is putting on a show tonight," says KP

Mohammad Sami to Ahmed Shehzad, OUT, and the show is over! Length and outside off, Shehzad premeditates as he shuffles across off. He can only lap-scoop it into the hands of short fine leg. Sami's slower ball gets Shehzad
Mohammad Sami to Elliott, 1 run, width outside off, Elliott keeps back and steers to third man
Mohammad Sami to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, back of a length on off, tucked through midwicket
Mohammad Sami to Elliott, 1 leg bye, slower short ball on middle, beats the flick. Hits the pad and rolls to cover
Mohammad Irfan to Elliott, 2 runs, banged in short with extra bounce. He aims to pull and sends a top edge to third man who runs to his left and keeps it to two
Wicket: ['Ahmed Shehzad c Badree b Mohammad Sami 64 (39b 9x4 1x6) SR: 164.10']

Commentary: Mohammad Irfan to Elliott, no run, cutter outside off, dab and a miss. Beaten for the change of pace
Mohammad Irfan to Elliott, 1 run, pacy short ball on off, rushes the batsman into a pull. Mistimed over midwicket

Mohammad Irfan to Sarfraz Ahmed, OUT, angled in on off, this is a slower one. Good change-up ball. Sarfraz goes for a big leg-side hoick. He can only top-edge into the lap of Smith at short third man. Dolly catch. Islamabad have pulled things back nicely

Mohammad Irfan to Elliott, 1 run, Smith throws the stumps down from backward point. Sharp work, quick release, but Elliott is just in. He had jabbed this one from outside off to Smith before turning back
Mohammad Irfan to Anwar Ali, 1 run, length and outside off, guided to third man
Mohammad Sami to Anwar Ali, no run, down the track, Sami pulls his length back outside off. Anwar has a big whoosh and does not connect
Mohammad Sami to Anwar Ali, FOUR, short and outside off, Anwar sits back and slogs to the cow corner fence, bisecting deep midwicket and long-on
Mohammad Sami to Anwar Ali, no run, short and zips through outside off, another swing and a miss
Wicket: ['Sarfraz Ahmed c Smith b Mohammad Irfan 3 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 75.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Sami to Anwar Ali, no run, full and outside off, another swipe from Anwar. He does not connect
Mohammad Sami to Anwar Ali, no run, and again! Anwar is swinging blindly but can't put bat on it
Mohammad Sami to Anwar Ali, no run, Anwar can't cool himself down. Five dots in the penultimate over. Anwar nearly swings himself off his feet. Ugly, dirty, filthy
Russell to Elliott, 1 run, length on off, he slogs and gets an inside edge onto the pad. The ball rolls to off
Russell to Anwar Ali, SIX, Anwar has finally connected one. This was full, angled in on middle, slower ball as well. He goes low and smites it over deep midwicket
Russell to Anwar Ali, 2 runs, near yorker, dragged to long-on for two. Good running

Russell to Anwar Ali, OUT, struck firmly but Khalid runs to his left from deep cover and snaps it up. Dug in short and outside off, Anwar stepped away and slapped it to Khalid. Hit-and-miss innings comes to an end
Russell to Elliott, no run, Russell nails an off-stump yorker, dug out to mid-off
Russell to Elliott, SIX, Elliott finishes the innings with a six! Eliott has Viv up on his feet and applauding. Full on off, Elliott gets under it and punts it over mid-off
